attributes.action: increase bank holidays from 8 days to 2 weeks to 3 weeks period and in straight line of a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like 8 bank holidays to be increased to more bank holidays, the bank holiday period to become a time when instead of 8 days of odd holiday day which people have work round for holiday period. The people have a week of holiday period preferably during easter week, xmas week or beginning of the year periods when there is zip happening in the uk either business wise or banking wise. Also other bank holidays for days in the year to commerate things from the past.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Pls. simplify/clarify the title and explanation of the idea
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
